    • createConference

      public void createConference(String targetCallId)
      Create a local conference with another call by its identifier. There can be only one local conference. If the local conference exists the method will add new participants into it.
      Parameters:
      targetCallId - the target call's identifier for a local conference

    • addToConference

      public void addToConference()
      Add the call in the existing local conference. The conference should exist.
